name: Holy Ship
description:
Get ready to set sail on an epic pirate adventure with Holy Ship - the ultimate local multiplayer party game! Choose your ship and set off to battle other pirate ships on the high seas.

With its cartoony graphics and easy-to-learn gameplay, Holy Ship is the perfect game to play with friends and family. Use your controllers to fire cannonballs at enemy ships, navigate treacherous waters, and collect powerups to gain an advantage.

Experience the thrill of ship-to-ship combat in Holy Ship, where strategy is key to victory.

Whether you're a seasoned pirate or a landlubber looking for adventure, Holy Ship has something for everyone. So hoist your sail, raise the anchor, and let the battle begin!
